column1:
How do I create a new Event?|

To create a new Event, please follow the steps below:
1. Click on &ldquo
column3:
from the main navigation menu bar at the top of any page on this community.
2. Select &ldquo
column5:
.
3. Fill the basic details for your Event and remember to enter name and time for it.
4. When you are done, click on &ldquo
column7:
to post your Event.
Now you can invite your friends to your event!

|Popular Features|Events

column1:
I want to change my RSVP status on an Event. How can I do this?|

To revise your RSVP status for an Event, go to that Event&rsquo
column2:
s Profile Page and search for your current RSVP status. From here, select a new response for the Event.

|Popular Features|Events

column1:
How can I join an Event?|

To join an Event, please follow the steps below:
1. Go to the Event you want to join.
2. Now, search for &ldquo
column3:
and click on it.
3. From the popup, select a suitable RSVP response and click &ldquo

My problem is not listed above. What should I do now?|

If your problem is not listed above, then please contact us by filling the &ldquo
column5:
